snippet: It is time that lawyers reshape corporate practice so they make less money and have time to serve struggling Americans who are desperate for representation.
abstract: Editorial, prompted by financial problems at law firm Dewey & LeBoeuf, urges the legal profession to reshape corporate practice so that lawyers make less money and have time to serve struggling Americans who are desperate for representation.
lead_paragraph: It is time that lawyers reshape corporate practice so they make less money and have time to serve struggling Americans who are desperate for representation.

headline.seo: The Cautionary Tale of Dewey & LeBoeuf
headline.main: The Cautionary Tale of Dewey & LeBoeuf
headline.print_headline: The Cautionary Tale of Dewey & LeBoeuf
